snippet.description: 实时音视频录制。需要用户授权 scope.camera、scope.record。默认宽度为 100%、无默认高度，请通过 wxss 设置宽高
snippet.body: <live-pusher class="${1}" url="${2}" mode="${3:SD|HD|FHD|RTC}" autopush="${4:false}" muted="${5:false}" enable-camera="${6:true}" auto-focus="${7:true}" orientation="${8:vertical}" beauty="${9:0}" whiteness="${10:0}" min-bitrate="${11:200}" max-bitrate="${12:1000}" bindstatechange="${13}" bindnetstatus="${14}" binderror="${15}"> ${16} </live-pusher>
